tit.cmt: タイトルなので補足を削除しました。

sen.j: 釜師（かまし）は、茶釜を鋳る職人。
sen.e: Kamashi is a craftsman to found chagama (iron tea ceremony pot).
Kamashi is a craftsman to found chagama (iron tea ceremony pot).
Kamashi is a craftsman to found chagama (iron tea ceremony pot).

sen.j: 茶の湯釜の製作技能者のこと。
sen.e: An expert to make tea kettles for Chanoyu (the tea ceremony).
An expert to make tea kettles for Chanoyu (the tea ceremony).
An expert to make tea kettles for Chanoyu (the tea ceremony).

sen.j: 室町時代末期に専門工が出現し、安土桃山時代には西村道仁、辻与次郎等が名工として知られる。
sen.e: In the end of Muromachi Period, there appeared founding technicians of tea kettles and, in the Azuchi-Momoyama Period, there were well-known master craftsmen such as Donin NISHIMURA and Yojiro TSUJI.
In the end of Muromachi period, there appeared founding technicians of tea kettles and, in the Azuchi-Momoyama period, there were well-known master craftsmen such as Donin NISHIMURA and Yojiro TSUJI.
